story.title: A Scandal in Bohemia
story.quote: You see, but you do not observe. The distinction is clear.

story.title: The Red-headed League
story.quote: It is quite a three pipe problem, and I beg that you won't speak to me for fifty minutes.

story.title: The Man with the Twisted Lip
story.quote: It is, of course, a trifle, but there is nothing so important as trifles.

story.title: The Adventure of the Three Gables
story.quote: I am not the law, but I represent justice so far as my feeble powers go.

story.title: The Problem of Thor Bridge
story.quote: We must look for consistency. Where there is a want of it we must suspect deception.

story.title: The Adventure of Shoscombe Old Place
The Yellow Face
story.quote: Any truth is better than indefinite doubt.

story.title: The Stockbroker's Clerk
story.quote: Results without causes are much more impressive.

story.title: The Final Problem
story.quote: If I were assured of your eventual destruction I would, in the interests of the public, cheerfully accept my own.
